The environment is comfortable, the details are well done and attentive.
The service staff are friendly and unpretentious. I feel that the companyâ€™s authorization for the staff to adapt to changes is sufficient. Itâ€™s really goodðŸ¤

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
